name: Deploy to EC2

on:
  push:
    branches: [ "main" ]
    paths:
      - 'backend/**' # 1. backend 폴더가 바뀔 때만 실행해라! (프론트 수정 시엔 실행 X)

jobs:
  build-and-deploy:
    runs-on: ubuntu-latest

    steps:
    - name: Checkout code
      uses: actions/checkout@v3

    - name: Set up JDK 17
      uses: actions/setup-java@v3
      with:
        java-version: '17'
        distribution: 'temurin'

    # 2. 백엔드 폴더로 이동해서 빌드하기
    - name: Build with Gradle
      run: |
        cd backend
        chmod +x gradlew
        ./gradlew clean build -x test

    # 3. 경로가 backend/build... 로 바뀜
    - name: Copy JAR to EC2
      uses: appleboy/scp-action@master
      with:
        host: ${{ secrets.HOST }}
        username: ${{ secrets.USERNAME }}
        key: ${{ secrets.KEY }}
        source: "backend/build/libs/*.jar"
        target: "/home/ubuntu/app"
        strip_components: 3  # backend, build, libs (3단계를 떼고 파일만 옮김)

    - name: Execute Deploy Script
      uses: appleboy/ssh-action@master
      with:
        host: ${{ secrets.HOST }}
        username: ${{ secrets.USERNAME }}
        key: ${{ secrets.KEY }}
        script: |
          # 기존 JAR 있으면 삭제 (깔끔하게)
          rm -f /home/ubuntu/backend-0.0.1-SNAPSHOT.jar
          # 옮겨온 파일을 실행 위치로 이동
          mv /home/ubuntu/app/*.jar /home/ubuntu/backend-0.0.1-SNAPSHOT.jar
          # 실행 스크립트 가동
          ./deploy.sh
